@usamiharu personally? Yeah I'd make the guy handsome. Hell, even if the guy's ugly as sin, if you're gonna introduce hypnotism make them see you as whoever they're interested in to fuck with them even harder...or hell, if the character is self-conscious about their looks, make the target see them as beautiful/handsome for extra ego points (as long as it shows the other person's PoV until the end). But even when rape is on the table, who can actually get off to looking at...well, that? It just negates all the hard work the author puts into making the female as hot as possible when you look at the rest of the scene for half a second and mini-me calls for a retreat. Even making the guy faceless is an upgrade because they're typically self-insert fantasies in the first place, and no one wants to see themself as an ugly/fat bastard, especially if they already are one.
